channel.title: Lovestruck
channel.description:
i wish to speak to the woman on here that goes by the name amy_webb. there's just one problem; i don't know how to approach such a delicate and petite woman. i was hoping you all could help me out, preferably l&P because he's the expert on women. a real womanizer if you will.
edit: i tried talking to a girl in real life. she told me i had no chance, so i decided to switch to internet women. they're much more spontaneous. and not to mention, they don't know who i really am.

item.title: Lovestruck
item.dc:creator: @sinisoul sini
item.description:
@sinisoul wrote:

[quote=“Fails, post:8, topic:521679”][quote author=sinisoul link=topic=640192.msg4314278#msg4314278 date=1371197890]
My face when I’m reading this thread.

On-topic: Get a life.
[/quote]
i feel the same way when reading your development topics.

@amy: now i see why you have a thing for l&P. i always thought it was his facial hair.

anyway, since i’ll never have a chance with you, you could tell some of your friends about this site. i’ll hit on them.[/quote]

Shots fired. Who are you again?

I’m pretty sure Amy is a female David. Like 10% sure.

Read full topic

item.title: Lovestruck
item.dc:creator: @F_A_I_L_S Fails
item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Phaze One:

If you shoot Tree a message, he comes second best on giving advice on how to seduce women. After Loveandpower of course

I read his guide, but it was way too advanced for me. I figured l&P would give the best advice because he’s an expert when it comes to amy. I guess it’s something to do with his sexy facial hair.

Hmm, maybe I could grow a beard too. Is it true if you drink a lot of milk you will receive facial hair faster?

@tabby: I tried that once, but the girl was a WoW fan.
